```{r}
#| message: false
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
#| label: make-plot
#| warning: false
penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = body_mass_g, y = flipper_length_mm, color = species)) +
    geom_point() +
    labs(title = "Penguins Body Mass compared to Flipper Length",
         x = "Body Mass", 
         y = "Flipper Length")
```
